Text:
Not working with Windows 7 64 bit.
Patch works and program starts, but DVDFab does not see my source drive, but it does see the Target drive when trying to back up DVD's and BD's.
I uninstalled this and reinstalled the previous version 8.0.6.5 which works perfectly.
Somebody please verify this issue.  

Maybe it's a DVDFab issue.  Every so often they release an version that has a problem.  This is the first time I have seen this issue with this program.

This one works with x64 bit.
Its not BBB Patch but crack which works.

TY

This is an executable file. i don't see the "msvcr90.dll" crack to copy. Also norton 2011 file insight indicates it may be untrustworthy. i have used file insight on many cracks before and gotten clean bills of health, not so sure about this one!
click the picture link above and read info  this is a AIO=all in one =one exe loader you double click and it loads a clickable menu for everything as the picture shows
